message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $12,500, which we believe strikes a balance between fair compensation for us and a favorable deal for you. Considering the product's worth to you is $15,000, this offer presents a unique chance for you to secure it without exceeding your valuation. We look forward to discussing this further with you.
